name: Miedo: Under The Mountain
description:
Miedo: Under The Mountain

In the land of Verdyn, a peculiar disease has befallen nature. The disease causes every fruit and crop, every piece of food to rot.
The people of Tanto village will starve to death if they cannot find a cure. Legends speak of an artifact underneath the holy mountain of Tawk with the power to grand any wish. A group from the village gathered to venture to the mountain.
This was their only hope.

Features:

Explore the dark depths of the mountain, armed with your backpack and lantern.

Encounter various inhabitants of the caves. It is your decision to fight or flight!

Manage your resources! Your lantern needs oil to function!

Solve various puzzles to progress.

(NOTE: Save files from the Demo are incompatible with the full release version)
(Controller Support: Partial)

Installation:

Download the zip file and extract it.

Run Miedo.exe

Uninstall:

Just delete the game folder

(Save file location: AppData/LocalLow/Moeps Games/Miedo)
